scripts.start: env-cmd concurrently "npm run start -w apps/dsl" "npm run start -w apps/home" "npm run start -w apps/nav" "npm run start -w apps/search" "npm run start -w apps/utils"
scripts.build: env-cmd concurrently "npm run build -w apps/dsl" "npm run build -w apps/home" "npm run build -w apps/nav" "npm run build -w apps/search" "npm run build -w apps/utils"
scripts.serve: env-cmd concurrently "npm run serve -w apps/dsl" "npm run serve -w apps/home" "npm run serve -w apps/nav" "npm run serve -w apps/search" "npm run serve -w apps/utils"
